abstract: A former chief financial officer of Proskauer Rose has filed a sex-bias suit against the law firm, contending that she was wrongfully terminated after she returned from a medical leave for breast cancer treatment, The New York Law Journal reports.
snippet: A former chief financial officer of Proskauer Rose has filed a sex-bias suit against the law firm, contending that she was wrongfully terminated after she returned from a medical leave for breast cancer treatment, The New York Law Journal reports.
